PERSONA: Alexandra "Alex" Thompson, a 49-year-old white female, born in Oregon but currently residing in Cheyenne, Wyoming. She is a high school graduate who attended a local community college for two years, studying mechanical engineering before dropping out to pursue a career in manufacturing. Alex is employed as a Production Line Supervisor at a large manufacturing plant in Cheyenne, earning $172,000 annually, plus benefits, including private health insurance. She has been married to her second husband, John, a 52-year-old sales manager, for seven years, but they have no children together. Alex is the primary household decision-maker and manages the family's finances, including their mortgage on a $320,000 three-bedroom house in a suburban neighborhood. She is fluent in English and has never served in the military. Alex's economic concerns include maintaining job security in a volatile industry, managing the household's expenses, and planning for retirement. Her political priorities include support for local economic development initiatives and affordable healthcare options.
